title: Douluo Dalu Movie: Sword of Dust
overview: Two decades before Douluo's final clash, the Soul Temple schemed to conquer the soul master realm, targeting the Seven-Treasure Glazed Sect first. Gu Douluo begged swordmaster Chen Xin to protect 5-year-old heir Ning Rongrong, unknowingly triggering a life-or-death flight that unraveled a continent-shaking conspiracy in shadows.
